resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Swipe left or right to remove items
Crop the image so only the items and their price remain (don\'t include the total price)

To ensure the desired text is recognised, please wait until boxes appear around the text. It is possible that the autofocus isn\'t working properly. If this occurs try moving the camera away from the ticket and slowly come closer again. If this doesn\'t work either try rotating your device (to landscape mode).

Welcome to Bill-It! If this is your first time, you might be seeing tutorial windows like this pop up. You can disable them by clicking the checkbox. If you would like to re-enable them later, you can do so in the settings.
Please fill in the following to start using the app
Name must be at least 2 characters long
Name can only consist of letters, spaces and hyphens
Please enter a valid E-mail address
You can not go back until you fix the following errors:
There were the following errors in %1$s:
Password must be at least 8 characters long
To add an online friend, fill in your friend\'s ID in the field below

A local friend is a friend that only exists for your app. They are stored locally (but also backed up to the server) and do not require internet access to add. \n\nAn online friend is a friend who has an account of their own. When you add an online friend to one of your groups, they will be able to track debts through the app the same way you do.
Only the group owner can remove other people
Swipe up to split, swipe down to delete
There seems to be something wrong with the price

Swipe the middle item up to split it between the buyer and consume. The buyer will gain credits and the consumer will lose credits.Align the buyer and consumer with the item to select them. Swipe any item downto delete it. Long press an item to edit it. Changes (splits, deletes and edits will only be saved when done is pressed.
Edit group name, add new group members, send an overview to group members, remove members by swiping left or right, manually add items, scan items or split them.
